name.es: IGAudioPlus - IG/Messenger Guardar Audio y Descargar

short.ar: احفظ رسائل الصوت من دردشات إنستجرام ومسنجر بسهولة بنقرة واحدة! 🎵📲🔊
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Easily save voice messages from your Instagram and Messenger chats with a click! 🎵📲🔊
short.de: Speichern Sie Sprachnachrichten aus Ihren Instagram- und Messenger-Chats ganz einfach mit einem Klick! 🎵📲🔊
short.es: ¡Guarda fácilmente los mensajes de voz de tus chats de Instagram y Messenger con un clic! 🎵📲🔊
short.fr: Enregistrez facilement les messages vocaux de vos discussions Instagram et Messenger en un clic ! 🎵📲🔊

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Save Voice Messages from Instagram & Messenger! 🎵📲🔊

Discover how easy it is to download audio messages from Instagram and Facebook Messenger with just a click! Our user-friendly Chrome extension makes it simple to save those important voice clips from your chats, ensuring you never lose a cherished memory again.

💻 How to Download Audio Messages on Instagram & Facebook Messenger:

Once you install our extension, it seamlessly integrates with your Instagram and Facebook Messenger chats. It automatically detects and lists all the voice messages exchanged in your conversations in a convenient popup. With just one click, you can download these audio files in their original quality, preserving every heartfelt word and emotion.

Why You Need Our Instagram/Facebook Voice Message Downloader:

Whether it’s a funny voice note from a friend or a touching message from family, our extension ensures you can save and treasure these moments forever. No more frustration over lost or inaccessible voice messages—our tool makes sure they’re always within reach.

IG, Instagram, Messenger, Facebook, Fb, Audio Saver, Download Audio IG, Download Audio Fb

Please Note: Instagram and Messenger are trademarks of Meta Inc., and our extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Meta Inc.
